section.p: If you have the codeword Expunge, immediately. If not, read on.

You have camped for the night on a lonely road. Three figures ride up to your campfire on skeletal horses. The riders wear the black garb of highwaymen, but their eyes glow redly with the feral bloodlust of vampires!
'Tonight, we feed on mortal blood!' cries one of them, and they spur their dire steeds towards you.

choices.choice: Turn them back with a holy word
